name: Shopware to Qdrant Test Import (Small Batch)
description: Test version with limited products for validation

Initialize Pagination.description: Reduced from 50 to 5 products per page for testing

Process Page & Check Pagination.description: Stop after 2 pages (max 10 products) for testing

Insert into Qdrant.description: Use test collection to avoid affecting production data

tasks: Confirm OpenAI API key has sufficient credits
Verify products appear in Qdrant test collection
Check vector embeddings are generated correctly
Increase batch sizes to full values

commonIssues.solution: Verify client_id and client_secret in Shopware admin
Check if products exist and are active in Shopware
Verify OpenAI API key and check credit balance
Confirm collection exists and credentials are correct
